lending  describes 
the  established  market

temporarily  from  one  party  (the  lender,  i.e.  CBSL),  to

them either on demand or at the end of any agreed term. 
Currently a selected Clearing House (CH) functions as the 
custodian for the supranational bonds and bonds issued

enable CH to lend at their wish depending on the demand 
for those bonds. Since the lending does not involve CBSL
